name: gokapi
description: Gokapi is a self-hosted file sharing app with short-lived, password-protected upload links. It focuses on privacy, simplicity, and fast linking, suitable for small team or personal workflows.
features: Expiring Links: Generate file upload links that automatically expire after a set time or download count.
Password Protection: Secure shared files with optional password requirements for access.
Privacy-Focused: No tracking or analytics, keeping file sharing simple and private.
Upload Management: Control file size limits, expiration times, and download limits per link.
Simple Workflow: Quick file sharing for teams without complex permission systems.
Download Tracking: Monitor how many times files have been downloaded before expiration.
Clean Interface: Minimal, distraction-free UI for fast file sharing operations.
Self-Hosted Security: Keep shared files on your infrastructure with full control over retention.
